title: Overwrite AppV1 with V24 OMEGA SINGULARITY UI (morphing cards + orbital core nav)

requirements.text: Completely replace the contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact V24 “OMEGA SINGULARITY” code provided by the user, treating it as the full application UI (Landing → Client → Pro/GenesisEngine) and preserving the provided components, local `DATA`, Tailwind classes, imports, and interaction logic (including Framer Motion `layoutId` morphing, the orbital CoreNav, the category slider, and the Vantablack aesthetic).

quotes: INSTRUCTION : Remplace INTÉGRALEMENT le code de `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx`.
LES 4 RUPTURES DE LA SINGULARITÉ : 1. MORPHING LIQUIDE ... via `layoutId` ... 2. ... Orbe Flottant ... menu circulaire ... 3. FILTRAGE "HAPTIC SLIDER" ... 4. ESTHÉTIQUE "VANTABLACK" ...

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` is a full overwrite containing the V24 code as provided (no refactors or feature additions).
The app still boots via the existing `frontend/src/App.tsx` wrapper rendering `AppV1` (no entry wiring changes).
In the Client Home tab, clicking a salon compact card morphs into the full-screen expanded view using Framer Motion shared `layoutId` (no route/page navigation).
The bottom orbital CoreNav is the primary navigation (Home/Agenda/Favorites) and expands/collapses into a circular menu from a central orb button.
The top category slider controls filtering immediately and the UI remains predominantly pure black with high-contrast white typography per the provided styling.

requirements.text: Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V24 `AppV1.jsx` overwrite by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required by this repository (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, unresolved symbols, invalid JSX, duplicate `export default`), without changing the intended UI design, copy, or interaction behavior from the provided V24 code.
acceptanceCriteria: `npm`/Vite build succeeds with no unresolved symbol/import errors originating from `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx`.
No changes are made to any frontend immutable entry files (including `frontend/src/main.tsx` and Internet Identity hooks).
Only mechanical build-breaking issues are fixed; the visible UI/animations/flows remain consistent with the provided V24 implementation.

constraints: Do not modify any frontend immutable paths (notably `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`).
Keep `frontend/src/App.tsx` as the thin wrapper that renders `AppV1` and do not change the app entry mounting.
Do not introduce backend calls or React Query-driven data flows into the V24 UI; keep the app’s behavior strictly local-state as in the provided code.
Use English for any user-facing text in this build request document (implementation may remain as provided by the user).
nonGoals: Backend/Motoko changes of any kind (no schema, persistence, seeding, booking logic, image upload, or auth changes).
Re-introducing previously implemented advanced features (Internet Identity login UX, role routing, React Query salon fetching, on-chain image storage, loyalty, bookings persistence, monopoly mode).
Design changes beyond what is strictly required to make the pasted V24 code compile in this repository.
